title: All 32 - New England Patriots: Moving on from Tom Brady, could Bill Belichick be tanking? with Ben Volin (Football 6/4)
description:
The Patriots are a frequent point of discussion on normal days for the Pick Six podcast, but on this episode we go even more in-depth with Ben Volin of The Boston Globe. Ben and host Will Brinson touch on the departure of Tom Brady (2:00) and the lack of quarterback additions (6:00), plus...is Bill Belichick capable of tanking (8:15)? The guys then focus on the tight end position (11:00) and analyze if the defense can be as good as last year (13:15) Finally, after years and years of absolute dominance in the division, conference and NFL, what are the expectations for what promises to be a very different 2020 (15:45)? Check out the latest edition of our 'All 32' series on the Pats to find out!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JPFinlayNBCS

itunes:subtitle: Tom Brady is gone. What else will change for the Patriots in 2020? Ben Volin of The Boston Globe joins us to break down a wild offseason in New England.
